name: Cave Crawler (GB)
description: Cave Crawler. An homage to retro video games of a bygone era. This game specifically is going to contain elements similar to Pokemon, the Legend of Zelda series, and Stardew Valley. I plan on adding five towns with respective subareas, as well as a city that you yourself can *sort of* customize. This is all a work and progress, and the current build has taken me a year and a half to complete (due to various hiatuses/hiati?). Hope you enjoy this as much as I did when I first tried out the gameboy a year and a half ago, as that was the spark that started my journey.
